short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a music track to Openwhyd, from any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to quickly add a YouTube track to your Openwhyd profile, from any web page that contains a supported embed.
For this extension to work, you need an account on openwhyd.org.
